    public class GwtDatePicker
extends com.google.gwt.user.datepicker.client.DatePicker
implements de.esoco.lib.property.DateAttribute
    A DatePicker subclass that uses an extended MonthSelector with functionality like year selection and time input.

    • Method Detail

      • getDate

        public java.util.Date getDate()
        Returns the current date of this instance. If it has been created in date and time mode the result will also contain the selected time.
        Specified by:
        getDate in interface de.esoco.lib.property.DateAttribute

      • setDateBox

        public final void setDateBox(com.google.gwt.user.datepicker.client.DateBox rDateBox)
        If this instance has a time picker this method can be used to set a date box that needs to be updated if the time value has changed. If not set a ValueChangeEvent will be fired instead.
        Parameters:
        rDateBox - The dateBox value
